api_list.name: /CategoryList/20170425

optional_parameters.name: affiliateId
optional_parameters.description: Rakuten Affiliate ID number. When specified item links in the response payload will include this ID. You can receive affiliate rewards when an item is purchased through your link.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Function name to be used with the JSONP output (UTF-8 URL encoded string) Alphanumeric characters, periods, or underscores

optional_parameters.name: categoryType
optional_parameters.description: Limit categories which are returned to "small", "medium", or "large".

optional_parameters.name: elements
optional_parameters.description: By default, API response all of the fields. You can change response fields by this parameter. This parameter's data is separated by comma(,).

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Either JSON or XML When JSON is specified the callback parameter can also be set in order to use JSONP.

api_list.name: /CategoryRanking/20170426
api_list.description: Find top recipes for each category.

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Function name to be used with the JSONP output (UTF-8 URL encoded string) Alphanumeric characters, periods, or underscores

optional_parameters.name: elements
optional_parameters.description: By default, API response all of the fields. You can change response fields by this parameter. This parameter's data is separated by comma(,).

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Either JSON or XML When JSON is specified the callback parameter can also be set in order to use JSONP.

optional_parameters.name: categoryid
optional_parameters.description: Limit categories of recipes which are returned.  Example: 10 (large category), 10-276 (medium category), 10-276-824 (small category)

optional_parameters.name: affiliateid
optional_parameters.description: Rakuten Affiliate ID number. When specified item links in the response payload will include this ID. You can receive affiliate rewards when an item is purchased through your link.
